preference.name: demo_clear_sessions
preference.description: Democratic - Clear votes for expired user sessions

preference.name: demo_use_search
preference.description: Democratic - Use smartlists for base playlist

preference.name: force_http_play
preference.description: Force HTTP playback regardless of port

preference.name: unique_playlist
preference.description: Only add unique items to playlists

preference.name: bookmark_latest
preference.description: Only keep the latest media bookmark

preference.name: show_playlist_media_parent
preference.description: Show Artist column on playlist media rows

preference.name: extended_playlist_links
preference.description: Show extended links for playlist media

preference.name: subsonic_legacy
preference.description: Enable legacy Subsonic API responses for compatibility issues

preference.name: api_force_version
preference.description: Force a specific API response no matter what version you send

preference.name: api_always_download
preference.description: Force API streams to download. (Enable scrobble in your client to record stats)

preference.name: subsonic_always_download
preference.description: Force Subsonic streams to download. (Enable scrobble in your client to record stats)

preference.name: api_hidden_playlists
preference.description: Hide playlists in Subsonic and API clients that start with this string

preference.name: api_hide_dupe_searches
preference.description: Hide smartlists that match playlist names in Subsonic and API clients

preference.name: libitem_browse_alpha
preference.description: Alphabet browsing by default for following library items (album,artist,...)

preference.name: use_original_year
preference.description: Browse by Original Year for albums (falls back to Year)

preference.name: hide_genres
preference.description: Hide the Genre column in browse table rows

preference.name: hide_single_artist
preference.description: Hide the Song Artist column for Albums with one Artist

preference.name: show_original_year
preference.description: Show Album original year on links (if available)

preference.name: show_subtitle
preference.description: Show Album subtitle on links (if available)

preference.name: show_playlist_username
preference.description: Show playlist owner username in titles

preference.name: cron_cache
preference.description: Cache computed SQL data (eg. media hits stats) using a cron

preference.name: catalog_check_duplicate
preference.description: Check library item at import time and disable duplicates
